name: Squirtle
fact: Squirtle's shell is not just for protection—it also helps it swim at high speeds.

name: Wartortle
fact: Wartortle's fur has a silken texture that provides protection from the water and keeps it buoyant.

name: Blastoise
fact: Blastoise has cannons on its back that can shoot water with incredible force.

name: Psyduck
fact: Psyduck suffers from persistent headaches that can trigger its psychic abilities.

name: Golduck
fact: Golduck has psychic powers that it uses to predict its opponent's moves during battle.

name: Tentacool
fact: Tentacool's body is mostly water, making it very buoyant in the ocean.

name: Tentacruel
fact: Tentacruel's tentacles contain toxic cells that can cause severe pain if touched.

name: Seel
fact: Seel's body is covered in a thick layer of blubber that keeps it warm in freezing water.

name: Dewgong
fact: Dewgong's body temperature is stable even in freezing waters, thanks to its thick layer of blubber.

name: Shellder
fact: Shellder's shell is incredibly hard and can withstand most physical attacks.

name: Cloyster
fact: Cloyster can open and close its shell with incredible speed to launch an attack.

name: Magikarp
fact: Magikarp is known for its pathetic appearance and its inability to do much but splash around.

name: Gyarados
fact: Gyarados is a fearsome Pokémon that can unleash a terrible storm when enraged.

name: Lapras
fact: Lapras is known for its gentle nature and its ability to communicate with humans through its song.

name: Vaporeon
fact: Vaporeon can melt into water and become nearly invisible to enemies.

name: Omanyte
fact: Omanyte's spiral shell was originally designed to protect it from the ocean's currents.

name: Omastar
fact: Omastar has tentacles that it uses to capture prey and defend itself from predators.

name: Kabuto
fact: Kabuto's shell is extremely durable, providing protection from attacks.

name: Kabutops
fact: Kabutops' scythe-like claws are designed to slice through water and prey with ease.

name: Carvanha
fact: Carvanha has razor-sharp fangs that can slice through steel and its own body for food.

name: Sharpedo
fact: Sharpedo's speed allows it to close in on its prey quickly and with deadly efficiency.

name: Wailmer
fact: Wailmer can store air in its stomach to keep itself afloat on the water's surface.

name: Wailord
fact: Wailord is the largest known Pokémon and can travel long distances across the ocean.

name: Feebas
fact: Feebas is known for its extremely low beauty and is often considered an ugly Pokémon.

name: Milotic
fact: Milotic is said to be the most beautiful of all Pokémon and is known for its serene and graceful nature.

name: Castform
fact: Castform can change its form to adapt to various weather conditions.

name: Clamperl
fact: Clamperl's body is covered in a tough shell that is extremely hard to crack.

name: Huntail
fact: Huntail lives deep in the sea and is known for its hunting skills and stealthy attacks.

name: Gorebyss
fact: Gorebyss is a graceful Pokémon that swims effortlessly and uses its long body to ensnare prey.

name: Luvdisc
fact: Luvdisc's heart-shaped body is a symbol of love and affection among Pokémon Trainers.

name: Spheal
fact: Spheal is known for its playful nature and enjoys rolling around on the ice.

name: Sealeo
fact: Sealeo balances objects on its nose skillfully and enjoys entertaining others with its tricks.

name: Walrein
fact: Walrein's thick blubber protects it from the cold and allows it to swim through icy waters.

name: Kyogre
fact: Kyogre is said to have expanded the sea by bringing heavy rain and causing massive floods.
